ModMetaData.name: Drop Pod Shuttle
ModMetaData.author: celphcs30
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a craftable drop pod shuttle that can transport up to 10 Space Marines. Uses drop pod graphics and sounds, but flies horizontally like shuttles (limitation of using shuttle mechanics).
[h1]Features[/h1] [list] [*] Craftable drop pod shuttle (4x4 size) [*] Transports up to 10 Space Marines (3000kg capacity) [*] Requires chemfuel for travel (900 capacity, 5 per tile, 60 minimum) [*] 1.5 hour cooldown between launches [*] Paintable to match your chapter colors [*] Large explosion on landing (5 tile radius) [/list]
[h1]Known Limitations[/h1] [list] [*] Uses horizontal flight path (like shuttles) rather than vertical drop pod movement. This is a technical limitation of using shuttle mechanics - the flight path is calculated from world map route direction. [/list]
[h1]Compatibility[/h1] Compatible with "Choose Where To Land" mod - allows manual selection of landing spots for the drop pod shuttle.
[h1]Credits[/h1] Assets (graphics, sounds, turret) from RimDark 40k - Mankinds Finest by Phonicmas, Mewn Goddess, Grim Cheese and UnfortunateДруг
Original mod: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3505068525
